questions.question: 1. What happens to the width of the single-slit diffraction pattern when the distance between the slit and the screen is increased?
2. In a single-slit diffraction pattern, what effect does using light with a shorter wavelength have on the pattern's width?

answers.c: It has no effect on the width
answers.d: It depends on the slit width

questions.question: 3. What happens to the spacing between adjacent maxima in a single-slit diffraction pattern when the width of the slit is increased?
4.Which factor primarily determines the angle at which the secondary maxima occur in a single-slit diffraction pattern?

answers.c: Distance between the slit and the screen

questions.question: 5. What is the condition for the appearance of secondary maxima in a single-slit diffraction pattern?

answers.a: They occur only for narrow slits
answers.b: They occur only for wide slits
answers.c: They always occur regardless of slit width
